description: The historical values of the CVG_MEM_RISK_ADJ_FACT table over time.

columns.name: CVG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the coverage record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The member that the risk adjustment factor applies to.

columns.name: EFF_DATE
columns.description: The effective date of the risk adjustment factor.

columns.name: TERM_DATE
columns.description: The termination date of the risk adjustment factor.

columns.name: RISK_ADJ_FACT_MODEL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The model of the risk adjustment factor.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


CMS-HCC Part C


CMS-HCC Part D


CMS-HCC Part A


CMS-HCC Part B

columns.name: ITM_HX_START_LOCAL_DTTM
columns.description: The start instant of when the coverage/line combination is valid in local time.

columns.name: ITM_HX_START_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The start instant of when the coverage/line combination is valid in UTC.

columns.name: ITM_HX_END_LOCAL_DTTM

columns.name: CVG_ITM_HX_REL_ACT_GUID
columns.description: This ID links this audit batch to one or more actions in the coverage action history table.
